scripts.postinstall: (cd background-tasks && yarn install) && (cd electron-app && yarn install) && (cd react-frontend && yarn install) && (cd logging && yarn install)
scripts.lint: (cd background-tasks && yarn lint) && (cd electron-app && yarn lint) && (cd react-frontend && yarn lint) && (cd logging && yarn lint)
scripts.test: (cd background-tasks && yarn test) && (cd electron-app && yarn test) && (cd react-frontend && yarn test) && (cd logging && yarn test)
